data.qoute: Let me be the one to make efforts that others can be inspired to follow my example.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Let your dreams lead you... to where your Soul knows it belongs.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Life is a roller coaster. You can either scream every time you hit a bump, or you can throw your hands up in the air and enjoy it.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Make your goals so big that your everyday problems seem insignificant.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: More powerful than the will to win is the courage to begin.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Never lose hope... hope is a rope to swing through life.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Never regret anything that has happened in your life, it cannot be changed, undone or forgotten.  So take it as a lesson learned and move on.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Never tell me the sky's the limit when there are footprints on the moon.
data.author: Unknown
